main event: An unidentified object was observed in the sky over Danvers, Massachusetts on June 30, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as small, white, and elliptical in shape., It was observed flying in a straight course at high velocity, then slowed down before disappearing into haze., The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds., Multiple witnesses reported on this sighting including a civilian., The report concluded that the object might have been a balloon, but insufficient data led to various conclusions.
witness description: The observer was a civilian who reported the sighting while looking at the sky.
